title: Number of vehicles in use worldwide 2006 to 2015
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Commercial vehicles, and Passenger cars. The y axis indicates the SOME LABEL and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Commercial vehicles, and Passenger cars are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of SOME LABEL in descending order is: 1. Passenger cars, and lastly, 2. Commercial vehicles.
Throughout the period, Passenger cars generally had the highest SOME LABEL relative to others with an average of 799826.3, and it reached its maximum at 2015 with a value of 947080.0.
Commercial vehicles mostly had the least SOME LABEL with a mean value of 289727.9, which peaked at 2015 with a value of 335190.0.
Commercial vehicles reported the lowest SOME LABEL about 247488.0 in Year 2006
The greatest difference of SOME LABEL between Commercial vehicles and Passenger cars occurs at Year 2015 and the smallest difference occurs at 2006.
